details: Independent and playful. Strong bonds with owners. Unique personalities in various breeds.
Loyal companions. Unconditional love. Versatile and trainable with various breeds and sizes.
Gentle, social. Requires care, balanced diet, safe environment. Forms close bonds with owners.
Diverse species, colors, and sizes. Well-balanced aquarium crucial. Relaxing and rewarding hobby.
Intelligent, social. Vocalizations, vibrant plumage. Unique needs for a happy, healthy life.
Small, nocturnal. Adorable. Requires a comfortable cage with bedding. Low-maintenance companion.
